name: Sisyphus-X VERSUS Gravity
description:
Face the power of gravity and race against time in this short space odyssey. 

You are controling the cursed ship Sisyphus-X, wich is exploring the galaxy when suddenly is warped inside a hollow planet.

Can you escape the planet in less than 3 minutes?

--------------------

Features

  • 17 original levels filled with obstacles like Red Rocks, Orange Rocks and my favorites, Purple Rocks.
  • Fun and fair, I hope.
  • PSX-type visuals made by someone with 0 artistic vision.
  • You can see your best time but I think it doesn't save it if you close the game so make a snapshot, sorry.
  • Music from Purrple Cat and Shane Ivers.
  • An EXcellent surprise if you reach the credits.
  • Playable on Browser, Windows and Mac.

--------------------

Controls

  • Right click to Boost
  • Left click to Emergency Stop
  • A/D to Rotate left and right
  • P to Reset Run
  • Esc to Pause
